This is the movie version of the manga series and was made in 1984. The movie was actually made after the series and gives a better storyline than the series. The good thing about the series is that you get to know more about the different fighting styles of the characters.
I've loved F.O.T.N.S ever since I was a Kid!  Thanks!

this is one of my favorite movies.  when i get the series, im gonna upload it.  dont resist downloading because of lack of seeders/leechers listed, there is usually 4 or more of us, and almost always someone with 100%, ill never remove this from azureus seeding.

Great movie, this copy is jumpy though, seems to skip frames on a regular basis.  Tried different codecs and player combos, it's the actual rip that skips frames.  If you can get past it, its a great watch!  Thanks Bowen83

Very right! Hehe... i was so excited to watch an old favorite again that i forget to remember to realize... it skips frames!  Camera pans are especially choppy as a result. The opening scene is a prime example. F#*king awesome movie though and i'm glad to have SOME copy of it. Thanks Bowen83.
Cheers Bowen - great film
